author: Kris Crocker
title: ❄️⚠️WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY for an icy Friday morning on the roads - Kris | News | kxly.com
text:
Kris Crocker Kris Crocker Chief Meteorologist
Author facebook Author twitter Author email Jan 2, 2025 Jan 2, 2025 Updated 14 mins ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save 4 News Now Chief Meteorologist Kris Crocker has your First Alert Weather Forecast
Heads up for a slippery start to Friday. Light freezing rain is expected to coat already frozen roads through mid-morning, so give yourself extra time if you're commuting or heading out for a "resolution run" around the neighborhood.
What We're Tracking A Closer Look Precipitation will start as freezing rain along Highway 2 and I-90 near Spokane early Friday Slick roads, parking lots and sidewalks Plan Your Friday Light freezing rain Friday morning By the afternoon, we’ll warm into the mid to upper 30s, and freezing rain will transition to all rain Extended Forecast COPYRIGHT 2025 BY KXLY. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. THIS MATERIAL MAY NOT BE PUBLISHED, BROADCAST, REWRITTEN OR REDISTRIBUTED.
